thread.title: Very disappointing
thread.title_full: Very disappointing - Review of New York Marriott Downtown, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: martin h
title: Very disappointing
text:
Half of the room had a wood floor. i had a women in high heels above me. heard every step she took and she took a lot of tehm.no room service. had to go downstairs to a restaurant but they would not let me take a glass of wine with me. they never mentioned they were giving me a handicapped room. Normally, i would be fine but just had a double hip replacement so not easy getting into or out of the shower. would not return.
Room Tip: stay at a different hotel See more room tips
